title: Natural Language Processing In 10 Minutes | NLP Tutorial For Beginners | NLP Training | Simplilearn
excerpt: Natural Language Processing is a popular application of Artificial Intelligence. This video on NLP in 10 minutes will make you understand why we need NLP and what NLP is.
